title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Slow update of checkboxes without busy cursor
description: The update of the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature is slow and takes about 30 seconds. During this process, a busy cursor should be displayed.
OB: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes approximately 30 seconds for the changes to be reflected.
EB: When updating the checked state of the table in the Export Zip feature, it takes approximately 30 seconds for the changes to be reflected. Additionally, a busy cursor should be displayed during this process.
SR:
1. Improve the performance of updating the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature so that changes are reflected more quickly.
2. Implement a busy cursor to be shown during the update process of the checkboxes in the Export Zip feature.
